condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Select the OS for Experion HS Server Node)*>,Windows 10 ENT 2019),[EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Redundant Servers)*>,Yes),[EQ](<*VALUE(Exp HS Select the OS for Exp HS Flex Station Node)*>,Windows 10 ENT 2019),[EQ](<* IsNull(<*VALUE(Exp HS Quantity of Flex Station)*>,0)*>,0))
name: MS-OSLW19 Set3.1
description:
CXCPQ-45837 Condition 2 - If "Select the OS for Experion HS Server Node"  = Windows 10 ENT 2019 AND "Redundant Server" = Yes 
Then Qty = 2 + If entered by user for "Quantity of Flex Station" is zero or blank
